page.title: 12A Game We Play In Pitsea.
page.content: Bulldog 1.To play Bulldog you need more than 2 players. 2.You choose someone to be"he". 3.The person whose"he" has to chose a subject and call it out to the other people. 4.The people who aren't"he" choose something to do with that subject. 5.Then the person whoose"he" chooses one of the things the other people have chosen. 6.If he calls out"spaniel" the person who chose that name has to shout Bulldog. 7.Then the people have to run to,for example a drain or pipe etc. 8.The person whose"he" has to try and had one of the other people.Then the person who got had has to be"he". Sarah French.
